name: Sex Simulator - Naughty Waitress
description:
A sex simulation game with visual novel elements where you play the role of a bar owner looking for new waitresses for his place.

GAME DESCRIPTION

If you had a great time playing our "Sex Simulator" series, you'll definitely enjoy this one!

As the title suggests, "Naughty Waitress" is a game where three different girls come for an interview.
Drinks need to be served and tables need to be cleared, so find someone who can do it all.
Each of them is trying to impress you with their skills, but you are looking for something more.
Find out if they are ready to work around the clock, or what they are really willing to do to get the job.

This video game features an arousing gameplay, high-resolution images and videos, realistic-looking characters, elegant environments, and steamy storylines.

FEATURES
90+ HD quality renders
HD animations
